## Controller.mergeOption() method

Merge option

Signature:

```typescript
mergeOption(key: any, options: any): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description    |
| --------- | ---- | -------------- |
| key       | any  | option key     |
| options   | any  | value to merge |

Returns:

void

## Remarks

Supplied options must be an object or container of options to merge
